tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Geetha was an excellent doctor. She explained things to me very well and was always upto date on the latest research and medicines in the field of her expertise. Sadly she's no more. It's a huge loss to the field of medicine. Patients like me miss her warm smile, her calm way of explaining things, her guidance and counseling. 

She was our family gynaecologist with most of the ladies in our family and extended family consulting her for gynac issues or pregnancy and childbirth matters.

I have visited before 4years for pre and post pregnancy she is well experienced and friendly doctor till now i didn't faced any problems regarding issues in pregnancy or after pregnancy i thankful for great experience i add with doctor.
